document.full_text: a mauritanian prosecutor on monday requested the death penalty against three alleged members of al qaeda in the islamic maghreb, suspected in the murder of american ngo worker christopher leggett in june 2009.
document.title: mauritania seek death penalty over slain american
lines_and_colors: a mauritanian prosecutor on monday requested the death penalty against three alleged members of al qaeda in the islamic maghreb, suspected in the murder of american ngo worker christopher leggett in june 2009.
